name: Fargo's Talismans Guide
landing_text: Fargo's Talismans is a mod that adds equippable curios which provide various modifiers to the player. Every talisman can be toggled via the $(c:/fargostalismans talisman gui)Talisman GUI$(/c). Come join our $(l:https://discord.gg/NuvfZGd4ES)Discord(/l). Thanks for playing!
